attributes.additional_details:
Needed for the health, safety and Welfare of the pupils and staff. Replace the building to improve on the outstanding attitude of staff and pupils. Improve to look of the area, encouraging social development of people, encouraging children to attend school.
No school should be left to be like this
attributes.background:
For over 10 years, Riverside Primary school has been promised money for a new build. With purse strings tightening, money going elsewhere, it has been put off.
The condition of the school is now at the point were children are feeling the strain of the leaky roof, antiquated heating system. Help us

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council here: https://www.wirral.gov.uk/about-council/have-your-say/petitions

We could accept a petition asking the UK Government to provide funding for renovations for all schools in England, is that's what you'd like to happen.
